cards.html:
With the Nintendo Switch selling 52,000 units last week in Japan, the hybrid console has now surpassed four million units sold in its origin country.

Nintendo’s latest console has reached this number 56 weeks since its launch and is on similar pace with the Wii’s record breaking sales (exceeding four million units sold 54 weeks since its launch).

In Japan, the Switch is now on record to have sold a whopping 4,037,144 units.

 

For more awesome Nintendo news, click here for a story about a certain bear and bird making their way into Super Smash Bros.. Also, be sure to like our Facebook page for more Nintendo updates.
